weka.classifiers.rules.vfdr

Class NominalAttributeStats.DiscreteDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.rules.vfdr.NominalAttributeStats.DiscreteDistribution
  • Enclosing class:
    NominalAttributeStats

    protected class NominalAttributeStats.DiscreteDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
    Inner class that implements a discrete distribution. Adapted from Mark Hall's VFDT implementation to consider unweighted instances.
    Author:
    Clément Fournier (clement.fournier@insa-rennes.fr)
